document.full_text: 'the scottsboro boys' received 12 nominations, second to 'the book of mormon,' which led the broadway field, as expected, with 14.
document.title: 'book of mormon' and 'scottsboro boys' lead tony nominations
lines_and_colors: 'the scottsboro boys' received 12 nominations, second to 'the book of mormon,' which led the broadway field, as expected, with 14.
